title: Chrissy and John’s baby joy
text:
SHE has been open about their fertility troubles and desire to start a family. And now Chrissy Teigen has shared some happy news on Instagram. 
The swimsuit model, 29, and her singer husband John Legend, 36, are expecting their first bub. 
“John and I are so happy to announce that we are pregnant,” Teigen said. 
“As many of you know, we’ve been trying to have a baby for a while now.” Baby joy 
The couple had been open about wanting to start a family. 
“I will say, honestly, John and I are having trouble,” Teigen said, according to E! News . 
“We would have kids five, six years ago if it’d happened,” she said. 
“But my gosh, it’s been a process.” Baby news ... Chrissy Teigen and John Legend are expecting a bub. Picture: Getty Images Source: Supplied 
Teigen recently told E! she was ready to settle down. 
“I’m ready to have a family and call Los Angeles my home,” she said. — John Legend (@johnlegend) October 13, 2015 
“I love bouncing around. I love going on tour with John, we’ve considered ourselves bi-coastal for 10 years now. 
“It’s definitely weird and different to have a home now.”
